sentence: We must change our leadership in November and defeat Brian Kemp.? If he wins the Republican primary, Kemp will likely face Democratic candidate Stacey Abrams in the midterm election.
author: Brad Dress
title: Georgia governor signs permitless handgun carry bill into law
